comments:
If an IU is installed that has no touchpoint actions, then the IU never gets added to the profile install registry.  The registry is updated by listening for an InstallableUnitEvent, but no event is being fired in this case. This is causing several of our JUnit tests to fail. Simon is investigating a fix.

Fixed in HEAD.
Although there is nothing to do we still need to fire the install/uninstall event so that the profile contains the correct content.
